4.text: Find the grooves in the ball.

5.text: Decide whether to use one or two hands.

6.text: Hold the ball up with your elbow a little above your hip.

7.text: Hold the ball in your dominant hand with your finger pads.

8.text: Start with your fingertips pointing toward your body.
8.vid: /f/f7/Spin a Basketball on Your Finger Step 8 Version 7.360p.mp4

9.text: Put your other hand on the side of the ball.
9.vid: /9/9c/Spin a Basketball on Your Finger Step 9 Version 7.360p.mp4

10.text: Flick your hand and thumb to spin the ball.
10.vid: /1/19/Spin a Basketball on Your Finger Step 10 Version 7.360p.mp4

11.text: Use your finger pads to guide the ball in the proper direction.

12.vid: /0/05/Spin a Basketball on Your Finger Step 12 Version 7.360p.mp4

13.text: Catch the ball on the tip of your dominant index finger.
13.vid: /d/df/Spin a Basketball on Your Finger Step 13 Version 6.360p.mp4

14.text: Keep your finger directly in the center of the ball where the grooves meet.

15.text: Move your other arm upward to meet the ball.
15.vid: /1/15/Spin a Basketball on Your Finger Step 15 Version 7.360p.mp4

16.text: Bring your arm back down to a comfortable position.
16.vid: /4/49/Spin a Basketball on Your Finger Step 16 Version 3.360p.mp4

17.text: Spin it on your fingernail or fingertip  for a faster, smoother spin.
17.vid: /2/24/Spin a Basketball on Your Finger Step 17 Version 3.360p.mp4

18.text: Slap the ball lightly with your non-dominant hand.
18.vid: /b/b8/Spin a Basketball on Your Finger Step 18 Version 3.360p.mp4

19.text: Continue practicing until you can balance the ball perfectly.
19.vid: /7/70/Spin a Basketball on Your Finger Step 19 Version 3.360p.mp4
